document.full_text: u.s. officials will announce at 5 p.m. cdt on monday whether they will go ahead with a plan to blow a hole in a mississippi river levee to relieve flood pressure and save the town of cairo, illinois.
document.title: u.s. decision on levee blast expected at 5 p.m. cdt
lines_and_colors: u.s. officials will announce at 5 p.m. cdt on monday whether they will go ahead with a plan to blow a hole in a mississippi river levee to relieve flood pressure and save the town of cairo, illinois.
